About Me

Hi! I'm Melissa! I'm currently in the University of Texas Coding program. I have experience working with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript so far, but more to come later! I am creating this portfolio to showcase my projects and to introduce myself to the world as a web developer. When I'm not sitting behind (multiple) computer screens I enjoy travelling, sports, playing
